subject: Update Your Account
body: Dear user, your account will be suspended unless you verify your information. Click here to proceed.
label: phishing

subject: Meeting Agenda
body: Hi team, attached is the agenda for tomorrow's meeting. Let me know if you have any questions.
label: legit

subject: Your Package is Delayed
body: We've noticed a delay in your shipment. Please confirm your address immediately by clicking here.
label: phishing

subject: Project Proposal
body: Please find attached the project proposal for review. Feedback welcome.
label: legit
